title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 24 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 24 2021
description:
The media plays a huge role in creating false narratives around certain stories and avoiding the obvious around others.

Start the edit here, IN: I wanted to start with continued analysis and coverage of the mass murder in Waukesha, in Wisconsin, because we've had some updates here.

Are You Smarter Than a Biden Cabinet Secretary? James Golden (aka Bo Snerdley) talks about the first Thanksgiving without Rush and the importance of keeping his traditions alive.

Bouncers at the door, covid testing centers in the garage, and other extremes people are taking on Thanksgiving. Clay's funny Thanksgiving story with his future in-laws.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
